name: 10 Person First Aid Kit - OSHA and ANSI Class A Compliant, Fully stocked Emergency Kit for Home, Office or Construction site
short_description: ANSI & OSHA Compliant for Workplace Safety – This first aid kit meets Type III ANSI standards and is OSHA compliant, making it a crucial addition to offices, worksites, and vehicles. Designed to provide medical support for up to 10 people, it helps ensure readiness for workplace injuries, minor cuts, burns, and unexpected emergencies.

Comprehensive First Aid for Emergencies – Be ready for cuts, burns, and other injuries with a fully stocked kit. It includes sterile combine pads (5x9), flexible fabric adhesive bandages, a triangular bandage (40x40x56), Burnshield dressing pad (4x4), rescue blanket, first aid scissors, nitrile gloves, and a CPR mask protector.

Complete Wound Care & Injury Protection – Treat wounds effectively with BZK antiseptic towelettes, sterile gauze sponges (3x3, 12-ply), waterproof adhesive tape (5 inches), oval eyepads, and an irrigate eye wash (1 oz.). The included disposable instant cold pack helps reduce swelling and provide relief from sprains and injuries.

Pain Relief and Burn Treatment Essentials – This emergency first aid kit contains burn cream (.9g) and triple antibiotic ointment (.9g packets) to prevent infections and soothe minor burns, cuts, and scrapes. The hand sanitizer packets (.9g) ensure proper hygiene when treating wounds in the field or at the workplace.

Durable, Portable & Wall-Mountable Case – Housed in a sturdy plastic case with secure latches, this kit is designed for durability and easy access during emergencies. Its compact, portable design makes it ideal for homes, offices, vehicles, and job sites, with built-in mounting tabs for wall storage.

product_description: Stay prepared for unexpected emergencies with the Rapid Care 25 Person First Aid Kit. This complete OSHA and ANSI compliant kit gives you the tools needed to respond quickly and confidently to injuries in the workplace, at home, or on the job site. Designed to support up to 25 people, it is an excellent choice for small businesses, construction teams, workshops, classrooms, and household safety planning. The kit contains 166 FDA inspected first aid items organized for fast access during urgent situations. Inside the heavy duty metal case, you will find adhesive bandages, gauze pads, trauma dressings, antiseptic wipes, burn gel, eye wash, gloves, tweezers, scissors, finger splints, a cold pack, and more. A first aid booklet is included to provide guidance during common emergency scenarios. The durable metal case measures 3.75 x 10.5 x 7.75 inches and is built to withstand harsh environments. It protects your supplies from dust and moisture while remaining fully portable with its carry handle. Wall mounting options make it easy to install in high traffic or high risk areas so help is always within reach. Rapid Care First Aid is committed to supporting the health and safety of its customers. When injuries occur, having the right equipment can make all the difference. Keep your team, staff, and loved ones protected with a first aid kit designed to perform when it matters most.
